text: Tara ki tabe dekhe na tadera samane ki rayeche ara ki rayeche tadera pechane -- mahakase o prthibite. Amara yadi ca'itama tabe tadera sange prthibike dhasiye ditama, athaba tadera upare akasa theke ekati canara phele ditama. Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche pratyabrta pratyeka bandara jan'ya.
